data.title: Distance Burgas Antalya, 1047 km, +2 routes
data.meta_description: Find distance from Burgas to Antalya, fastest route 1047 km, shortest route 936 km, economy route 939 km, distances by segments of the route Burgas Antalya
data.text:
Detour feature displays a detour route between Burgas and Antalya; to delete the detour route, please click on the link distance from Burgas to Antalya or on the button Calculate distance.

Routes and distances from Burgas to Antalya

Flagma calculates distances Burgas → Antalya for car driving; offers the following routes: fastest route 1047 km, shortest route 936 km, economy route 939 km; and determines car and truck driving times. Flagma simultaneously calculates distances between cities for all the routes. The tabulated links show distances from Burgas to other cities of Bulgaria.

In the table and on the map the roadways Burgas → Antalya are shown with line patterns. Each road type has its own line pattern; the brighter and the thicker the pattern of the road from Burgas to Antalya is, the higher the class of the road is. The map and the table for the route Burgas → Antalya can be printed out in A4 format.

Fuel consumption is calculated as a total amount of fuel consumed on each part of the way with a due account of the road type: freeway, highway,... In the calculation form please indicate the fuel consumption per 100 km for highway driving, according to the specifications of your vehicle.

Frequent distance calculation requests

Routes are offered by Flagma for informational purposes only. The website Administration is not responsible for the accuracy of the route information. When planning your route, please take into consideration the current state of the roads and weather conditions.
